alert.note: Alert for Southern Westchester (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued September 30 at 12:57PM EDT until October 01 at 3:00PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM EDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...One foot of inundation above ground level expected in vulnerable areas near the waterfront and shoreline around the times of high tide, especially with the morning high tide cycles. * WHERE...In Connecticut, Southern Fairfield County. In New York, Southern Westchester County. * WHEN...Until 3 PM EDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding is expected in the more vulnerable locations near the waterfront and shoreline. Some roads and low lying properties including parking lots, parks, lawns, and homes and businesses with basements near the waterfront will experience minor flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Minor flooding may also occur with the Monday morning high tide cycle. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. STAMFORD HARBOR AT STAMFORD CT MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 9.3 FT, MODERATE 10.9 FT, MAJOR 12.3 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.5 FT, MODERATE 3.1 FT, MAJOR 4.5 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 30/01 PM 10.1/10.6 2.2/ 2.7 0.8/ 1.3 2 MINOR 01/01 AM 9.3/ 9.8 1.5/ 2.0 0.8/ 1.3 1 MINOR 01/01 PM 9.9/10.4 2.1/ 2.6 0.7/ 1.1 1 MINOR 02/02 AM 8.8/ 9.3 1.0/ 1.5 0.6/ 1.1 1 NONE 02/02 PM 9.5/10.0 1.7/ 2.2 0.6/ 1.1 1 MINOR BRIDGEPORT HARBOR AT BRIDGEPORT CT MLLW CATEGORIES - info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
